div.h3: In the next few days specific information will be released in regards to the District’s Continuity of Education Plan. That information will include Internet- and non Internet-based instructional format options, electronic device deployment for students that do not have a district-issued Chromebook, how “school” will run, how we will maintain safety, and most importantly how we will care, love and grow together.

div.div: The Graduation Task Force announces revised plans to recognize our students for their academic accomplishments. Click to read more.

Prom, which was originally scheduled for Saturday, May 16, 2020, has been postponed due to the recent events and building closures. However, we are happy to announce that we have chosen an alternate date. Click to read more.

img.alt: Connellsville Area School District announces continuity of education plans Featured Photo

h3.a: Connellsville Area School District announces continuity of education plans

div.div: Click to read about CASD's Continuity of Education plan during the COVID-19 closure.

img.alt: Important Information Regarding the Coronavirus Featured Photo

div.div: On March 22, 2020 District officials confirmed that a District employee had presumptively tested positive for COVID 19 on March 21, 2020. At this time, the employee, who is assigned to the High School, is experiencing mild flu-like symptoms that have resulted in fatigue and bed rest. The employee has not been to any CASD building nor has the employee participated in any CASD initiatives since March 13, 2020. Please click "Read full story" for more information.

img.alt: Start your nursing career at the Connellsville Area Career and Technical Center! Featured Photo

h3.a: Start your nursing career at the Connellsville Area Career and Technical Center!

div.div: Connellsville Area Career and Technical Center is pleased to announce a collaboration with Indiana County Technology Center's Practical Nursing Program (LPN). The Practical Nursing program, which will be housed at the Connellsville Area CTC, is a part-time 16 month program for area residents!
